author: timbeiko
content:
From the go-ethereum server: 

> Geth v1.10.8 out, a hotfix for an undisclosed security vulnerability. Please update, details will be provided at a later date.
> 
> - https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/releases/tag/v1.10.8
> - https://twitter.com/go_ethereum/status/1430067637996990464
> - https://www.reddit.com/r/ethereum/comments/paigzu/geth_v1108_security_hotfix_please_update_details/
